ping.description: Checks the bot's and Discord API's latency.

usage.description: Use this command to see the bot's current response time. It's a great way to know if I'm online and responsive!

args.target: Optional: The target to check latency against (e.g., 'api', 'database').

ping.reply: üê¢ Pong! API: {{apiLatency}}ms, Me: {{latency}}ms. Slow and steady... or maybe not!
ping.pinging: üí´ Spinning the antenna to get the best signal...

setlang.name: setlang
setlang.description: Sets the bot's language for this server.

usage.description: Use this command to change the language the bot uses to respond in this server.

args.locale: The locale to set (e.g., pt-BR, en-US).

setlang.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command. Only members with 'Manage Server' permission can do so.
setlang.success: Bot language set to **{{locale}}** in this server.

error.command_not_found: ü§î | Was this command really supposed to exist? I looked on my iPod and it's not there, please try again later, I'll alert my developers.
error.generic_error: ‚ùå | Damn, my windows is updating, I won't be able to answer right now, notifying developers that this command is down or defective.
